cmp: 生 (to be born/to give birth/life/to grow)
mng: victory, success, to beat, to defeat, to surpass, victorious, superior to, to get the better of, better than, surpassing, superb (of vista), beautiful (scenery), wonderful (view), (Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear, equal to (a task)

exm.mng: a place famous for its scenery or historical relics, scenic spot
nothing more beautiful can be imagined (idiom)
qualified, competent (professionally), to be up to a task
to score a victory, to prevail over one's opponents
cannot bear or stand, be unequal to, very, extremely
